pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, March 15, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

Private meetings.

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a vaccination clinic at the Palais des congrès de Montréal. 

Palais des congrès de Montréal
1001 Place Jean-Paul-Riopelle 

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Quebec, François Legault.

Closed to media. 

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and hold a media availability. He will be joined by Premier of Quebec François Legault, Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry François-Philippe Champagne, Quebec’s Minister of Economy and Innovation Pierre Fitzgibbon, and President and Founder of Lion Electric Marc Bédard. 

Palais des congrès de Montréal
1001 Place Jean-Paul-Riopelle 

Notes for media:    

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.

Ottawa, Ontario

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
